page.title: 10EFFECT OF RAF CHURCH FENTON
page.content: One thing affecting everyone in Church Fenton is{aircraft noise}from the local RAF station. Everyone questioned said they are most aware of it and most inconvenienced when there is{night flying;}it keeps them awake.(Strangers to the village find it frightening).Most people find it tolerable; they become used to it. Some new residents were unaware of the extent of the noise before they came, but people put up with the noise because they like the village. Aware of the problem no flights occur at key times eg weddings, funerals and exams. Other effects are: 1.The shops and station gain custom. 2.A restriction on building due to the aircraft. 3.The annual Air Display, lasting one day, creates a large amount of traffic and noise.
